casebody.data:
First Department,

November, 1937.

(November 5, 1937.) In the Matter of the Application of Otto Grunewald, Appellant, for a Mandamus Order against James E. Finegan and Others, Constituting the Municipal Civil Service Commission of the City of New York, Respondents.

Order unanimously affirmed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion. Present — Martin, P. J., Townley, Untermyer, Cohn and Callahan, JJ.
